title: Designing Amazon Affiliate E-Commerce Stores: A Beginner's Guide
headline: This free course will take you through the steps for making and sustaining sales on Amazon Affiliate E-commerce Stores.
description: Do you need to make money without leaving the comfort of your home? Would you like to supplement your income or have a backup career prospect during these uncertain times? Affiliate marketing might just offer a solution for you. Seize this opportunity to sell online products that are in demand. What are you waiting for? Enrol in this beginners guide today to learn all about making sales on Amazon E-Commerce!

courseDescription:
Amazon is home to millions of items for purchase. Many of these products are sold for various discounts during times like Thanksgiving and the Festive Season. Promotions like these offer customers the chance to enjoy low prices and the convenience of reliable delivery across the globe. This course provides you with the opportunity to understand Amazon's vast and innovative sales space. We will take you through the basic steps necessary to start selling Amazon products through affiliate websites and making you a passive earner. You will learn simple and practical processes for customizing your very own Amazon Affiliate website. And we'll analyze the required online tools for beginners so that you can become an instant user on completion of this guide. There are many opportunities in Amazon sales. So why don't you make the most of your free time to earn some passive income online today?

Entrepreneurs have a basic rule: "Maintain Flexible Persistence". We all should look to implement this in our lives. It has become vital for a techy generation like ours. Automating sales and using technologies like WooCommerce and WordPress makes it possible to achieve and maintain flexible persistence in making money online. You will learn about the functions of WooCommerce with your customized affiliate website. You will also learn about WordPress's different features to affiliate marketers to tune their websites into unique business platforms. Understanding these technologies, alongside their applications, allows you to become a specially good marketer for Amazon and its many products. What are you waiting for? Don't lose the chance to learn all about this popular 21st-century marketing medium. 

Upon successful completion of this course, you will know how to start making recurring online sales. This course will equip you with the fundamental knowledge to take more advanced courses in this area. We will guide you through essential steps for successfully signing into all necessary platforms required to become an Amazon affiliate marketer. You will be able to evaluate preferred configurations and select specialized hosts for their different online affiliate needs. You will also learn how to style your pages to ensure customers keep coming back. This course is helpful to product owners from various industries, especially those struggling to carve and maintain market shares. Beginners may even kick start a professional journey into the many affiliate marketing platforms available within their local countries and regions. Start your learning journey into the world of online affiliate marketing today and get paid from your comfort zone!

Start Course Now
certificateDetail:
All Alison courses are free to enrol study and complete. To successfully complete this certificate course and become an Alison Graduate, you need to achieve 80% or higher in each course assessment. Once you have completed this certificate course, you have the option to acquire an official Diploma, which is a great way to share your achievement with the world.

Your Alison certificate is:
  • Ideal for sharing with potential employers
  • Include it in your CV, professional social media profiles and job applications.
  • An indication of your commitment to continuously learn, upskill & achieve high results.
  • An incentive for you to continue empowering yourself through lifelong learning.
Alison offers 3 types of Diplomas for completed Diploma courses:
  • Digital certificate: a downloadable certificate in PDF format immediately available to you when you complete your purchase.
  • certificate: a physical version of your officially branded and security-marked certificate, posted to you with FREE shipping.
  • Framed certificate: a physical version of your officially branded and security marked certificate in a stylish frame, posted to you with FREE shipping.
Start Course Now

All certificate are available to purchase through the Alison Shop. For more information on purchasing Alison certificate, please visit our FAQs. If you decide not to purchase your Alison certificate, you can still demonstrate your achievement by sharing your Learner Record or Learner Achievement Verification, both of which are accessible from your Dashboard. For more details on our certificate pricing, please visit our Pricing Page

modules.name: Module
modules.description: In this module, you will learn about various key components of the Amazon Affiliate E-Commerce program together with the course methodology adopted for the course. You will also learn about configuring websites, domains, and general features of the WordPress interface.
topics: Amazon Affiliate E-Commerce Basics - Learning Outcomes
Amazon Affiliate E-Commerce Basics - Lesson Summary

modules.name: Module
modules.description: In this module, you will learn about setting up a complete Amazon affiliate store using WordPress and WooCommerce. Also, you will learn about steps for applying various features to your Amazon affiliate store covering their customizations and respective configurations.
topics: Building an Amazon Affiliate Store  - Learning Outcomes
Setting Up Your Amazon Associate Account and Home Page
Building an Amazon Affiliate Store  - Lesson Summary

  • Lesson Summary
    • The Amazon Affiliate Program is the best available platform for products because of its range, commission rates, and availability across different countries.
    • The Amazon Affiliate network allows the usage of WordPress, WooCommerce, Elementor, and WooZone plugins.
    • Affiliate marketing is the process of earning a commission by promoting other people's companies or products.
    • Keywords play an important role in a domain. They help domains rank higher in Google searches.
    • SSL is used in securing websites including those used by Amazon affiliate marketers.
    • WordPress allows you to easily design websites without having to deal with codes and other complicated technologies.
    • WordPress allows the creation of XML sitemaps, telling Google's bots where your website pages are and which are worth crawling. 
    • SSL stands for Secure Sockets Layer. It is used for securing and safeguardign sensitive information on websites.

  • Learning Outcomes
  • Upon the successful completion of this module, you should be able to:
    • Describe how to create and link an Amazon associate account.
    • Discuss how to import products from Amazon.
    • Explain how to properly design a home page.
    • Identify how to automate earnings from your Amazon Affiliate store.
    • Analyze factors that improve Search Engine Optimization for your page and content.
    • Evaluate customization options for WordPress functions.
    • Outline methods for customizing WooZone and WordPress features.
